about_the_game:
• Unique armoured vehicle “War machine”
  • Weapon: epic crossbow “Phoenix”, rare course rocket “AT Wasp”, 2 pcs.
  • A unique epic cabin “Echo”
  • “Twin wheels”, 6 pcs.
  • Engine “Hot red” of epic rarity
  • Structural parts of “War”
  • Unique character portrait “Victor Pyrrhus”
  • Rare decor “Furnace”, 2 pcs.
  • Exclusive sticker “Red horse”
  • Spray can with unique paint “Scorching sand”
  • Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55
  • 1500 in-game coins

Before the disaster, Victor Pyrrhus worked in the financial division of Waderkvarn Corporation. Cars were the only thing to match his fascination with his job. And the more lethal the vehicles turned out to be, the more they attracted his attention. Though everyone laughed at him behind his back, Victor personally participated in every test of armoured vehicles. During one of them, a piece of plating fell from a great height and hit him on the neck not covered by a helmet. After being treated on site, Victor was left in the infirmary of the test site. It was an accident, but it was precisely the thing that saved him from the madness of crossout that swept the planet.

Victor adored armoured vehicles before the disaster, and the crisis awakened a talented mechanic inside him. And the former financier, having several years and a warehouse of military equipment in store, became the chief engineer of the Horsemen of Apocalypse gang. Now whenever he has free time between shootouts, he listens to blues and builds armoured vehicles for his people.

The unique armoured cars presented in packs are known for their particular balance of weapons, armour and speed characteristics in combat. To put the car in the garage, after starting the game, open the blueprint menu («B» key ), go to the “Packs” tab, select the desired armoured car and press the “Assemble” button.

When you purchase this pack, the number of parts that can be used to build a vehicle increases to 55.

Buying the pack also gives early access to some factional structural parts. These parts become available immediately upon purchase and are not handed out again upon reaching the appropriate reputation level. Some parts are one-of-a-kind, and players can only own one copy of such parts. When simultaneously buying a standard and deluxe pack the constructional parts and portraits are not duplicated.

Unique portraits are an excellent opportunity to stand out among survivors.

Paint cans are a way to make your armoured car unlike the others.

Coins — is the in-game currency, which is used on the market to purchase armoured car parts from other survivors and to pay for the rent of part-building workbenches. Attention! When buying multiple packs, the acquired coins stack!
